snippet.title: Don't Starve Together Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Don't Starve Together is out of Early Access! Get it now on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/322330
Just because we're leaving early access doesn't mean the fun is over! We have lots of new content and surprises for Don't Starve Together. Check out our "leaving early access" post to get a taste of what's to come!

Launch Post: http://forums.kleientertainment.com/topic/66132-dont-starve-together-leaving-early-access/


About Don't Starve Together:

Don't Starve Together is the standalone multiplayer expansion of the uncompromising wilderness survival game, Don't Starve. Now including Reign of Giants; adding new characters, seasons, creatures, biomes, and Giant new challenges to Don’t Starve Together. 

Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries of this strange land. 

Cooperate with your friends in a private game, or take your chances with strangers online. Work with other players to survive the harsh environment, or strike out on your own. 

Do whatever it takes, but most importantly, Don't Starve.
